title: TRACE magazinefont
content:
what is the font used for the yellow **TRACE**?

and is it the same as with the text **ERYKAH BADU**?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829061844im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TRACE_3785.jpg)

[postscript]  
I love her hair!!
author: rosmedia

comments.content:
First, I don't think it's the same font. The white lettering on black backgrounds is the same as "ERYKAH", but I don't know what font it is. I think the magazine logo is (maybe) a customization that started as a slab serif, but it may have been drawn from scratch. The A is the real oddball, and I can't think offhand of a slab serif with that style A.

- Mike Yanega
